Text:
Dan- "Abridged by Neville Teller".

Thanks for the torrent!
Really good book. This was the first time I listened to it. I'm definitely going to go buy the book! Thanks for the up!
The synopsis should include the part where master chief kills everyone.
Note: This is NOT for the Harper Perennial publication.
This is not the whole book :(
This is in fact the full book, from start to finish, thanks Man great upload :D

Its the whole book. But a lot of the details and such are left out. I listened to it along with the book so it skips a lot of lines. But its good if you dont have the book. Reading the book is a lot better because Huxley describes a lot of things to really put you in the moment.
